https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t8ICzTH9MxkrM9zGP0LJsa7n5QQ.jpg This is one of the five films legendary director Lucio Fulci supervised in 1989 to re-use some of the gory bits for his 1990 gorefest "A Cat in the Brain". "Bloody Psycho" features a haunted castle plus wimpy doctor Vogler,who is performing some sort of a psychic therapy on lesbian owner of the place. Bloody Psycho
